docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 19--Successful operation of the International Fund, which will be established next March 1 under the Bretton Woods agreement, will depend in the Western Hemisphere to a considerable degree on the rapidity with which American export...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 19--Successful operation of the International Fund, which will be established next March 1 under the Bretton Woods agreement, will depend in the Western Hemisphere to a considerable degree on the rapidity with which American export business can be expedited, according to studies made here today.

docs.lead_paragraph: THE 1947 travel horizon is broadening. Ships covering both the east and west coasts of South America will soon be back on frequent schedules. Other ships now returning to their regular pre-war runs will touch more Caribbean ports and itineraries are being worked out for cruise ships on special tours.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Dec. 28--The action of President Juan Peron in receiving yesterday in the Presidential Palace the delegation of the opposition Herrerista party of Uruguay was published in the Uruguayan press today without comment. The delegation was...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Dec. 28--The action of President Juan Peron in receiving yesterday in the Presidential Palace the delegation of the opposition Herrerista party of Uruguay was published in the Uruguayan press today without comment. The delegation was headed by Senator Ramon Vinas.
